PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Early gems Freeze Pulse + Arcane Surgre Stormblast Mine
Level 4 Stormblast Mine + Lesser poision + Swift Assembly Frostblink + Arcane Surge Frostbomb + Onslaught Orb of Storms
Level 8 Stormblast Mine + Added Lightning + Swift Assembly Frostblink + Arcane Surge Frostbomb + Onslaught + Added Lightning Orb of Storms
Level 10 Stormblast Mine + Added Lightning + Swift Assembly Flame Dash + Arcane Surge Frostbomb + Onslaught + Added Lightning Orb of Storms
Level 16 Stormblast Mine + Added Lightning + Swift Assembly Flame Dash + Arcane Surge Cold Snap + Onslaught + Added Lightning Orb of Storms Herald of Ice Herald of Thunder
Level 18 Stormblast Mine + Controlled Destruction + Trap and Mine Damage Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Controlled Destruction + Added Lightning Orb of Storms Herald of Ice Herald of Thunder
Level 24 in a perfect world Stormblast Mine + Controlled Destruction + Trap and Mine Damage + Elemental Focus Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Controlled Destruction + Added Lightning + Elemental Focus Frostbite/Elemental Weakness Orb of Storms Herald of Ice Herald of Thunder
Level 28 in a perfect world Pyroclast Mine + Controlled Destruction + Trap and Mine Damage + Elemental Focus Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus Frostbite/Elemental Weakness Orb of Storms Herald of Ice Herald of Thunder
Level 31 in a perfect world Pyroclast Mine + Controlled Destruction + Trap and Mine Damage + Elemental Focus Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Frostbite/Elemental Weakness Arctic Breath Orb of Storms Malevolence Clarity
Level 38 in a perfect world Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting + Lesser Multiple Projectiles Malevolence + Clarity + Enfeeble/Blasphemy (leveling)
After Sovereignty and Whispers of Doom Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Cold Snap + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Blasphemy
5 Link Chest Acquired Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting Vaal Cold Snap + Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Vaal Grace + Increased Duration + Rallying Cry Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting + Lesser Multiple Projectiles Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Blasphemy
5 Link Staff and 5 Link Chest before uber lab Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting, Vaal Grace Vaal Cold Snap + Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite + Faster Casting Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting, Rallying Cry Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Blasphemy
5 Link Staff and 5 Link Chest after uber lab Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting, Vaal Grace Vaal Cold Snap + Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite + Despair Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting, Rallying Cry Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Blasphemy
6 Link Staff and 6 Link Chest after uber lab Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting, Vaal Grace Vaal Cold Snap + Vortex + Controlled Destruction + Elemental Focus + Hypothermia + Efficacy Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Curse on Hit + Frostbite + Despair + Faster Casting/Chain Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting, Rallying Cry Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Blasphemy
GG Flame Dash + Arcane Surge + Faster Casting, Vaal Grace Vaal Cold Snap + Vortex + Awakened Controlled Destruction + Awakened Elemental Focus + Awakened Swift Affliction + Efficacy Orb of Storms + Increased Critical Strikes + Awakened Curse on Hit + Frostbite + Despair + Temporal Chains Arctic Breath + Bonechill + Faster Casting, Rallying Cry Malevolence , Clarity , Enfeeble + Awakened Blasphemy
